content:
Sure! Here are the operating hours for the boutiques mentioned:

1. The Old Cinema:
   Monday-Saturday: 10am-6pm
   Sunday: 11am-5pm

2. The Ravenscourt Apothecary:
   Monday-Saturday: 10am-6pm
   Sunday: Closed

3. The Handmade Cake Company:
   Monday-Saturday: 8am-6pm
   Sunday: Closed

4. Cocoba Chocolate:
   Monday-Saturday: 9am-7pm
   Sunday: 11am-5pm

5. Lulu & Fred:
   Tuesday-Friday: 10am-6pm
   Saturday: 10am-5pm
   Sunday-Monday: Closed

Please note that operating hours may be subject to change, so it's always best to check their websites or call in advance to confirm.
